action.action-desc: Mrs. Walorski introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from requiring the use of facial recognition technology for access to any Internal Revenue Service online account or service.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Save Taxpayers’ Privacy Act.

section.header: Prohibition on facial recognition for access to Internal Revenue Service accounts
section.text: The Secretary of the Treasury may not establish or maintain any verification process for access to an Internal Revenue Service online account or service using facial recognition technology.
